pages.text: $(li)Emeralds are green gemstones that can be rarely found and mined in caves over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).

$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/evoker)Evokers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/executioner)Executioners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/hobgob)Hobgobs$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/mimic)Mimics$(/l), $(l:patchouli:bosses/ogre)Ogres$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/trickster)Tricksters$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:illagers/vindicator)Vindicators$(/l) may drop Emeralds upon death.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) will trade you interesting items in exchange of Emeralds and viceversa.$(br)$(li)Emeralds can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/emerald_armor)Emerald Armor$(/l), a $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/speaker_block)Speaker Block$(/l), and an $(l:patchouli:decoration/advancement_frames/advancement_frame)Advancement Frame$(/l) too.
